transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan, ye matam
Executive: Ji haan.
Customer: Hai na, Universal Engineers se baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Kahan se sir?
Customer: Universal Engineers.
Executive: Ji bataye.
Customer: Okay. Sir mere ko account ke related query thi. Isme mere ko sirf retail lead hi aa rahi hai maximum.
Executive: Sir aap apna vo wala number batayenge jo aapne IndiaMART pe lagwa rakha hai?
Customer: IndiaMART pe lagwa rakha hai yehi number hai. Mere teenon number hai mere paas. Par aapka kya naam hai? First wala batao na.
Executive: Haan first wala.
Customer: First wala number hai na mere paas. Ye chaar number kuch bhi.
Customer: 99
Executive: 99
Customer: 0
Executive: 0
Customer: 95
Executive: 95
Customer: 0
Executive: 0
Customer: 0
Customer: 27
Executive: 27
Customer: 76
Executive: 76
Customer: 76. Haan.

Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan bataye.
Executive: Universal Engineers se baat kar rahe hai aap?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Ek second.
Executive: Kya problem face kar rahe hai sir aap?
Customer: Isme mere ko hai na matlab maximum retail lead hi aa rahi hai. Ek quantity, do quantity, paanch quantity. Haan. Matlab ye IndiaMART hai jo B to B ka hi hai to fir ye B to C ki requirement hi nahi aani chahiye na.
Executive: Ek second sir.

Executive: Haan video call pe connect kar sakta hu sir mai aapke saath?
Customer: Kya? Haan video call pe connect. Aisa hai to mai aapko evidence kar de du?
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Evidence chahiye to evidence de deta hu.
Executive: Nahi nahi mai aapko sir Google Meet pe connect karunga.
Customer: Okay okay Google Meet pe connect karenge na aap?
Executive: Ji ji.
Executive: Ek baar aapne jis number se dial kiya mere ko vo number bhi bol denge sir?
Customer: Hmm. Haan rukiye 81
Executive: 81
Customer: Hello. 4073
Executive: 4073
Customer: 40734092
Executive: 4092
Customer: Hmm. Ho gaya na 4092 wala number hai na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai mai bas link bhej ke aapko phone kar raha hu.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Getting retail leads instead of B2B leads.

- Wants to provide evidence of the issue.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for registered mobile number.

- Executive offered to connect via Google Meet.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a Google Meet link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, b2b, b2c, google meet
